comments.text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; Win64; x64; rv:6.0a1) Gecko/20110503 Firefox/6.0a1
Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; Win64; x64; rv:6.0a1) Gecko/20110503 Firefox/6.0a1 ID:20110503030212

Several times did i right-click the process, and selected 'end process' - and eventually got a dump file to be written. I still have the dump file, if anyone wants it; email: ian.schloemer@tampabay.rr.com - also, the dump will be availiable on my http server - http://petiatil.dyndns.org/dumps/ - process was using over 160k in memory.

Reproducible: Didn't try

Steps to Reproduce:
All I'm aware of is that an adobe flash plugin was running and when i attempted to close firefox, the windows would dissapear but the the process wouldnt term (which was a problem since the process was using over 160k in memory.)
